00122 // instead to set long 122166241(for 2008), 1241067600(for 2009) so 
00123 // to use this _offsetTimeStamp[0]*100000 + _offsetTimeStamp[1]

00129   offsetTimeStamp.push_back(60*60*5); //To set UCT 2009/04/30/ 00:00
00130 //110810 to CDT  offsetTimeStamp.push_back(60*60*9); //To set UCT --> to JST
00131   offsetTimeStamp.push_back(60*60*-5); //To set UCT --> to CDT.

00133                               _offsetTimeStamp,

00249 void IntegratedScECALCalibrationProcessor::conditionsChanged( LCCollection * col )
00250 {
00251   std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00252 
00253   if (colName == _ScECALMIPColName) 
00254     {
00255 
00256 #if b110908
00257    cout << "b110908 _ScECALMPIColName=" << _ScECALMIPColName.c_str() << endl;
00258 #endif
00259       
00260       _ScECALMIPCol = col;
00261       _MIPConstantChanged = true;
00262     }
00263   else if ( colName == _ScECALIntCalibColName )
00264     {
00265        _ScECALIntCalibCol = col;
00266        _IntCalibConstChanged = true; 
00267     }
00268   else if ( colName == _ScECALGainColName )
00269     {
00270        _ScECALGainCol = col;
00271        _GainConstChanged = true; 
00272     }
00273 #if TempOK
00274   else if ( colName == _ScECALTemperatureColName && _dataYear != 2008 )
00275     {
00276        _ScECALTemperatureCol = col;
00277        _TemperatureChanged = true; 
00278     }
00279 #endif
00280   else if ( colName == _ScECALNoisyChannelColName ) 
00281     {
00282         _ScECALNoisyChannelCol = col;
00283         _NoisyChannelChanged = true;
00284     }
00285 
00286 };

00290 void IntegratedScECALCalibrationProcessor::init(){
00291 
00292   //IntegratedScECALProcessor::init();
00293   if (_pedestalSubtraction==true) {
00294     for (unsigned short layer=0; layer<ScECAL_NLAYERS; layer++){
00295       for (unsigned short strip=0; strip<ScECAL_NSTRIPS; strip++){
00296         _pedSum[layer][strip] = 0;
00297         _pedSumSquare[layer][strip] = 0;
00298         _pedNum[layer][strip] = 0;
00299         _ped[layer][strip] = 0;
00300         _pedError[layer][strip] = 0;
00301       }
00302     }
00303     _pedCounter = 0;
00304   }
00305   _hitCounter = 0;
00306   _invalidMIPCounter = 0;
00307   _invalidSaturationCorrectionCounter = 0;
00308   _eventCounter = 0;
00309   _saturationCounter = 0; 
00310 
00311   // Read calibration constants
00312 
00315 
00316   printParameters();
00317 
00318   // conditions flags
00319   _MIPConstantChanged  = false;
00320 //110508.coterra
00321   _IntCalibConstChanged = false;
00322 //110511.coterra
00323   _GainConstChanged = false;
00324   _TemperatureChanged   = false;
00325 //121004
00326   _NoisyChannelChanged = false;
00327 
00328   std::stringstream message;
00329   bool error = false;
00330 
00331   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALMIPColName))
00332     {
00333       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALMIPColName << std::endl;
00334       error = true;
00335     }
00336 
00337 //110508.coterra
00338   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALIntCalibColName))
00339     {
00340       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALIntCalibColName << std::endl;
00341       error = true;
00342     }
00343 
00344 //110511.coterra
00345   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALGainColName))
00346     {
00347       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALGainColName << std::endl;
00348       error = true;
00349     }
00350 #if TempOK
00351 if ( _dataYear !=2008 ) { //TODO: This should be removed after 2008 temperature DB problem is fixed. 
00352   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALTemperatureColName))
00353     {
00354       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALTemperatureColName << std::endl;
00355       error = true;
00356     }
00357 }
00358 
00359   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALNoisyChannelColName))
00360     {
00361       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALNoisyChannelColName << std::endl;
00362       error = true;
00363     }
00364 
00365 
00366 #endif
00367   if (error) {
00368     streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00369     //    throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00370   }
00371 
00372 
00373 #if NoisyChannelDAT 
00374   int noislayer,noisstrip;
00375 
00376   //TODO: write noisy channel information into CALICE database.
00377 
00378   //9a09.Noisy channel
00379   //ifstream file_noisy("/scratch/coterra/frmAzusa/scecal_codes/calib_data/NoisyChanSep08.dat");
00380   //ifstream file_noisy("/home/coterra/tempo_data/NoisyChanSep08.dat");
00381   ifstream file_noisy("./NoisyChanSep08.dat");
00382   if (file_noisy==0){
00383     cout<<"!!!ERROR ScECAL Noisy Channel data File Does Not EXIST!!!"<<endl;
00384   }
00385   _nnoisy = 0;
00386   for ( int i = 0; i < ( ScECAL_NLAYERS * ScECAL_NSTRIPS ); i++ ) {
00387     _noisychanLayer[i] = -99999;
00388     _noisychanStrip[i] = -99999;
00389   }
00390   do {
00391     file_noisy>>noislayer>>noisstrip;
00392     _noisychanLayer[_nnoisy] = noislayer;
00393     _noisychanStrip[_nnoisy] = noisstrip;
00394     _nnoisy++;
00395   } while (!file_noisy.eof());
00396 
00397 #endif
00398 
00399   _listReadCounter = 1; 
00400 
00401 };

00407 };

00410 void IntegratedScECALCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt) {
00411 
00412   int nEvent = evt->getEventNumber();
00413 //  if ( nEvent%100 == 0 ) {
00414     std::cout <<" Event number : "<< nEvent <<std::endl;
00415 //  }
00416 
00417 //Noisy channel read start
00418  
00419   if (_NoisyChannelChanged )
00420     {
00421  
00422     if (!_ScECALNoisyChannelCol)
00423       {
00424          streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update Noisy channel, ScECAL Noisy channel collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00425          //        throw StopProcessingException(this);
00426       }
00427 
00428      _nnoisy = _ScECALNoisyChannelCol->getNumberOfElements(); 
00429      for (int i = 0; i < _nnoisy; ++i)
00430       {
00431          ScECALNoisyChannel *ScEcalNoisyChannel = new ScECALNoisyChannel( _ScECALNoisyChannelCol->getElementAt(i) );
00432  
00433          _noisychanLayer[i] = ScEcalNoisyChannel->getID0();
00434          _noisychanStrip[i] = ScEcalNoisyChannel->getID1();
00435  
00436          if ( nEvent%1000 == 0 ){ 
00437            cout << "NoisyChannel[" << i << "] layer-strip " << _noisychanLayer[i] << "-" << _noisychanStrip[i] << endl;
00438          } 
00439  
00440  
00441          delete ScEcalNoisyChannel;
00442       }
00443  
00444  
00445     _NoisyChannelChanged = false;
00446  
00447     }
00448 //Noisy channel read finish
00449 
00450 
00451 // Read calibration constants
00452 
00453   // MIP calibration constants
00454   int layer, strip, nSuccess;
00455   double mpv_landau, mpv_error, slope, slope_err, setTemp;
00456 
00457   double mipcalib_mean = 0;
00458   double mipcalib_err_mean = 0;
00459   double slope_mean = 0;
00460   double slope_err_mean = 0;
00461   double setTemp_mean  = 0;
00462   int mipcalib_count = 0;
00463 
00464 
00465 #if checkchange
00466   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 0=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00467 #endif
00468 
00469  if (_MIPConstantChanged ) // updateScECALMIP();
00470    {
00471 #if checkchange
00472   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 1=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00473 #endif
00474 
00475     if (!_ScECALMIPCol)
00476       {
00477         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update MIP, ScECAL MIP collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00478         //        throw StopProcessingException(this);
00479       }
00480     for (int i = 0; i < _ScECALMIPCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00481       {
00482         ScECALMIPfit *ScEcalMip = new ScECALMIPfit( _ScECALMIPCol->getElementAt(i) );
00483 #if checkchange
00484   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 1.3=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00485 #endif
00486         layer = ScEcalMip->getID0();
00487         strip = ScEcalMip->getID1();
00488         mpv_landau  = ScEcalMip->getmpv_landau();
00489         mpv_error   = ScEcalMip->getmpv_error();
00490         slope       = ScEcalMip->getslope();
00491         slope_err   = ScEcalMip->getslope_err();
00492         setTemp     = ScEcalMip->getsetTemp();
00493         nSuccess    = ScEcalMip->getnSuccess();
00494 #if checkchange
00495   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 1.4=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00496 #endif
00497         _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] = mpv_landau;
00498         _mipcalibconst_err[layer-1][strip-1] = mpv_error; //110907 coterra sigma_gauss /sqrt( area_langau );
00499         _mipSlope[layer-1][strip-1] = slope;
00500         _mipSlopeErr[layer-1][strip-1] = slope_err;
00501         _mipSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1] = setTemp;
00502 
00503 //        if ( nEvent%1000 == 0 ){ 
00504           cout << "MIPcalib " << layer << "-" << strip << " " << _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] 
00505                << " +- " << _mipcalibconst_err[layer-1][strip-1] << " slope: " << _mipSlope[layer-1][strip-1] 
00506                << " +- " << _mipSlopeErr[layer-1][strip-1] << " setTemp: " << _mipSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1]
00507                << endl;
00508 //        }
00509          bool noisy = kFALSE; 
00510          for ( int i = 0; i < _nnoisy; i++ ) {
00511             if ( layer== _noisychanLayer[i] &&
00512                  strip== _noisychanStrip[i]    ) {
00513                      noisy = kTRUE;
00514                      _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] = 999999.9;
00515             }
00516          }
00517          if ( !noisy && _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] > 0.1 ) {
00518               mipcalib_mean += _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1];
00519               mipcalib_err_mean += _mipcalibconst_err[layer-1][strip-1];
00520               slope_mean        += _mipSlope[layer-1][strip-1]; 
00521               slope_err_mean    += _mipSlopeErr[layer-1][strip-1];
00522               setTemp_mean      += _mipSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1];
00523               mipcalib_count++;
00524          }
00525         delete ScEcalMip;
00526       }
00527 
00528      mipcalib_mean /= mipcalib_count;
00529      mipcalib_err_mean /= mipcalib_count;
00530      slope_mean        /= mipcalib_count;
00531      slope_err_mean    /= mipcalib_count;
00532      setTemp_mean      /= mipcalib_count;
00533 
00534 //110514 these lines should be in this loop 
00535 //110514.0224.coterra CAUTION that layer stats 0 and strip also...
00536      for (int layer=0;layer<ScECAL_NLAYERS;layer++) {
00537        for (int strip=0;strip<ScECAL_NSTRIPS;strip++) {
00538          if ( _mipcalibconst[layer][strip] < 0.1) {
00539             _mipcalibconst[layer][strip]=mipcalib_mean;
00540             _mipcalibconst_err[layer][strip]=mipcalib_err_mean;
00541             _mipSlope[layer][strip] = slope_mean;
00542             _mipSlopeErr[layer][strip] = slope_err_mean;
00543             _mipSetTemp[layer][strip] = setTemp_mean;
00544          }
00545        }
00546      }
00547 
00548     _MIPConstantChanged = false;
00549 
00550    }
00551 
00552 #if checkchange
00553   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 2=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00554 #endif
00555 
00556 //*********** read the MIP from database*************
00557   // Revise calibration constants for no-good channels
00558 
00559 #if checkchange
00560   cout << "HELLO  _MIPConstantChanged 3=" << _MIPConstantChanged << endl;
00561 #endif

00643      gainsetTemp_mean      /= gaincalib_count;

00741 #if TempOK
00742  if (_TemperatureChanged && _dataYear != 2008 ) 
00743   {
00744     for (int i = 0; i < _ScECALTemperatureCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i) //for ScECALTemperatureCol Element
00745       {
00746 
00747       if (!_ScECALTemperatureCol)
00748         {
00749           streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update temperature data, ScECAL Temperature collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00750           //        throw StopProcessingException(this);
00751         }

00754    //   time_stamp -= _offsetTimeStamp; 
00755 
00756           ScECALTemperature *ScEcalTemper = new ScECALTemperature( _ScECALTemperatureCol->getElementAt(i) );
00757 
00758 //        year = ScEcalTemper->getyear();
00759 //        month = ScEcalTemper->getmonth();
00760 //        day = ScEcalTemper->getday();
00761 //        hour_minute = ScEcalTemper->gethour_minute();
00762 //        second = ScEcalTemper->getsecond();
00763           double timeStampOndotori = ScEcalTemper->gettimestamp();
00764           float temperature_1 = ScEcalTemper->gettemp1();
00765           float temperature_2 = ScEcalTemper->gettemp2();
00766           float temperature_0 = ( temperature_1 + temperature_2 ) /2. ;// avarage of two temp
00767 
00768 #if debugDeep
00769         cout << "HERE_TEMP_FROM_DB; stamp= " << std::setprecision(16) <<timeStampOndotori 
00770              << " temp1= " << temperature_1 << " temp2= " << temperature_2 
00771              << " temp_avr= " << temperature_0 << endl;
00772 #endif
00773 
00774 // NOTE THAT "Ondotori" is name of stand alone measurement system used in 2009 
00775 //   ScECAL test beam experiment at FNAL.
00776 //110714.coterra timeStampOndotori is like "xxxxx.yyyyyyyyyy".
00777 // We want to comvert this number to in the same format as in the CALICE DB 
00778 // timestamp.
00779 // We set time1 is a five-finger integer of xxxxx and 
00780 // time2 is a 10-finger integer from numbers after decimal point, like yyyyyyyyyy.
00781 // Note that, but I don't know the reason, time1 part is incremantd 
00782 //  when the time arrive at "one" o'clock, not 0(zero) of time2.
00783 // NOTE THAT 39933.0000000000 corresponds to 
00784 // JST of ( 2009/04/30 00:00:00.0000...) and 
00785 // Unixtime of ( 2009/04/30 00:00:00.0000... + 09:00:00 ) 
00786 // According to (23x60x60 + 50*59 +55)/9999421296( the numerator is a time in second 
00787 // just before the day changes and denominator is time2 part in table corresponding 
00788 // to the numerator and this number should be 0.00000864 ), 
00789 // one second corresponds to 1/0.00000864 of time2 or one in time2 
00790 // To make this number, 99994 and 21296 are assigned as 
00791 // _ondotori2stamp[1] and _ondotori2stamp[2] respectively.
00792 // In this way, 23x60x60 + 50*59 +55 should also be parameters.
00793 // (TODO;) Therefore I should change way of parameters in this context.
00794 
00795 // Since xxxxx becomes xxxxx + 1 when yyyyyyyyyy > 60x60/0.00000864
00796 // xxxxx is incremented +1 during 0 < yyyyyyyyyy < 60x60/0.00000864 in this code.
00797 //
00798 // How did I get these relations.
00799 //  from 
00800 // year month day hour_minute second timestamp(ondotori) temp1 temp2
00801 // =================================================================
00802 // 2009 4 29 2359 55 39932.9999421296   24.5000   24.4000
00803 // 2009 4 30 0000 55 39932.0006365741   24.6000   24.4000
00804 // from upper line 9999421296 corresponding to 2009/April/29th 23:59:55
00805 // Therefore, (23x60x60+59x60+55)seconds corresponts to 9999421296
00806 // and 2009/April/30th/00:00:00 """ CHICAGO summer time(CDT) corresponds
00807 // 1241067600 in unix time. Therefore, this number corresponds to 39932+1.
00808 // Plus 1 is due to that 39932 is incremented to 39933 after one hour.
00809 // and we use 39933 as time1 for also 39932.0000000000 to 
00810 // 39932.(59minutes+59seconds)
00811 
00812           int  time1 = (int) timeStampOndotori; //Integer part of timestamp of Ondotori
00813 #if debugDeep
00814         cout << " time1= " << time1 << endl;
00815 #endif
00816           //long64  ten2ten = 100000*100000;
00817           long ten5 = 100000;
00818           double timeminer = timeStampOndotori - (double)time1;
00819 #if debugDeep
00820         cout << " timeminer= " << timeminer << endl;
00821 #endif
00822           double middle = timeminer * ten5;
00823                 middle *= ten5;
00824           long64 time2 = (long64)middle; //* ten5 * ten5 ;
00825           //long64 time2 = timeminer * ten2ten;
00826 
00827           long64 maxtime_blwDecimal = (long64)_ondotori2stamp[1]*100000 + _ondotori2stamp[2];
00828 #if debugDeep
00829           cout << " time2 = " << std::setprecision(16) << time2 << " maxtime_blwDecimal = " <<std::setprecision(16) << maxtime_blwDecimal << endl;
00830 #endif
00831 
00832           double   time_denomi = ((double)maxtime_blwDecimal/ten5);
00833           double  time2toUnixtimefactor = (23.*60.*60. + 59.*60. + 55.)/ten5;
00834                   time2toUnixtimefactor /= time_denomi;
00835 #if debugDeep
00836           cout << " time2 = " << time2 << " time2toUnixtimefactor = " <<std::setprecision(16) << time2toUnixtimefactor << endl;
00837 #endif
00838 
00839 
00840           bool zerohour = false;
00841 //TODO; 3600 is metal wired.
00842           if ( time2 * time2toUnixtimefactor < 3600. ) {
00843               zerohour = true;
00844           }
00845           if ( zerohour ) { 
00846               time1 = time1+1;
00847           }
00848           long64 timestampT = long64( offset + 24.*60.*60.*(time1 - _ondotori2stamp[0]) + time2*time2toUnixtimefactor);
00849           timestampT -= _offsetTimeStamp[3]; // Ondotori Time is in JST 
00850 #if debug
00851           cout << " timestampT = " << timestampT << " time1 - _ondotori2stamp[0] = " << time1 - _ondotori2stamp[0]  << endl; 
00852 #endif
00853 
00854           //_templist.insert(map<long64, float>::value_type( timestampT, temperature_0 ) );
00855           _templist.insert(pair<long64, float>( timestampT, temperature_0 ) );
00856           datacounter ++;
00857 #if debugDeep
00858           cout << " _templist.size() = " << _templist.size() << endl;
00859 #endif
00860 
00861 
00862         if ( nEvent%1000 == 0 ){ 
00863           cout << "Temperature avrage:1:2 "  
00864                << temperature_0 << ", " << temperature_1 << ", " << temperature_2 << endl;
00865         }
00866 
00867         delete ScEcalTemper;
00868       }
00869 
00870       _TemperatureChanged = false;
00871 
00872   }  //The END of  ScECALTemperatureCol Element
00873 #endif

00877         cout << "datacounter = " << datacounter << endl;
00878   }
00879 #endif

00883 #endif

01031         _pedSumSquare[layer-1][strip-1] += pow(ampl,2);
01032         _pedNum[layer-1][strip-1]++;
01033         _ped[layer-1][strip-1] = _pedSum[layer-1][strip-1]/_pedNum[layer-1][strip-1];
01034         _pedError[layer-1][strip-1] = sqrt(_pedSumSquare[layer-1][strip-1]/_pedNum[layer-1][strip-1]-pow(_pedSum[layer-1][strip-1]/_pedNum[layer-1][strip-1],2));
01035         //delete hit;
01036       }
01037 #if b110827a
01038   cout << "HERE_3" << endl;
01039 #endif

01049     if ((_pedCounter >= _minPedNumber) || (_pedestalSubtraction==false)) {
01050 #if b110827a
01051   cout << "HERE_5" << endl;
01052 #endif
01053      _eventCounter++;
01054       for (unsigned i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned>(inVector->getNumberOfElements()); i++) {
01055         CalorimeterHit* aCalorimeterHit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
01056         if (!aCalorimeterHit) {
01057           std::stringstream message;
01058           message << "Collection " << _inputColName << " doesn't contain CalorimeterHits" << std::endl;
01059           throw runtime_error(message.str());
01060         }
01061         //FastCaliceHit* hit = new FastCaliceHit(aRawCalorimeterHit);
01062         const unsigned short layer = aCalorimeterHit->getCellID0();
01063         const unsigned short strip = aCalorimeterHit->getCellID1();
01064         //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
01065         //std::cout << "mod: " << mod << ", cell: " << cell << std::endl;
01066         //#endif        
01067         if ((layer > ScECAL_NLAYERS) || (strip > ScECAL_NSTRIPS)) {
01068 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
01069           std::cout << "  invalid channel " << layer << "-" << strip << std::endl;
01070 #endif  
01071           //delete hit;
01072           continue;
01073         } 
01074 
01075         float ampl = aCalorimeterHit->getEnergy();
01076         //float amplErr = 0;//aCalorimeterHit->getEnergyError();
01077         if (ampl>30000) {
01078           _saturationCounter++;
01079           _saturations[layer-1]++;
01080         }
01081         //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
01082         //std::cout << "IHC: old hit: " << mod << " " << cell << " " << hit->getEnergyValue() << std::endl;
01083         //#endif
01084         if (_pedestalSubtraction==true) {
01085           ampl -= _ped[layer-1][strip-1];
01086           float amplErr = std::sqrt(aCalorimeterHit->getEnergyError()*aCalorimeterHit->getEnergyError()+pow(_pedError[layer-1][strip-1],2));
01087           if (ampl < _significanceCut * amplErr) {
01088             //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
01089             //std::cout << "  not significant" << std::endl;
01090             //std::cout << ampl << " " << _significanceCut << " " << aCalorimeterHit->getEnergyError() << " " << _pedError[layer-1][strip-1] << std::endl;
01091             //#endif
01092             //delete hit;
01093             continue; 
01094           }
01095           //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
01096           //std::cout << "IHC: new hit: " << mod << " " << cell << " " << ampl << std::endl;
01097           //#endif
01098         }
01099         _hitCounter++;
01100         //cout << "CHECKING " << _outputCol->getNumberOfElements() << " " << inVector->getNumberOfElements() << endl;

01103

01114         //Npe = ampl * _intercalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] 
01115         //  / _gaincalibconst[layer-1][strip-1];
01116         //Npe_corrected = this->SaturationCorrection(Npe);
01117         //ampl = Npe_corrected / _intercalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] 
01118         // * _gaincalibconst[layer-1][strip-1];
01119 
01120         //9910.2033 saturation correction. coterra
01121         //The number of photon.
01122 //110712.1619.coterra get temperature of this event
01123 
01124 //        long64 timestampTempmeasure = ScEcalTemperature->gettimestamp();
01125 //        float temp_this_evt = gatTempFrmDB
01126 
01127 //110712.1542 coterra. temperature correction was temporally[?] 
01128         // implemented. temp_this_evt is gotten temp for this event.
01129         //_tempcorr_gain[2] is temp. that gain data was taken.
01130 
01131         float gainconst_tempcorr = _gaincalibconst[layer-1][strip-1];
01132         if (_tempcorrgainOn) {
01133            if (_uniformGainSlope[0] > 0.00001 ) { _gainSlope[layer-1][strip-1] = _uniformGainSlope[0];}
01134            gainconst_tempcorr = gainconst_tempcorr
01135                                 - _gainSlope[layer-1][strip-1] / 100.     //note negative sign.
01136                                 * ( temp_this_evt - _gainSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1] ); 
01137         } 
01138 
01139         float ampl_adc = ampl;
01140 
01141         ampl = ampl / 
01142               ( gainconst_tempcorr / 
01143                 _intercalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] );
01144 
01145 #if enecheck
01146         cout << " ampl 1 = " << ampl 
01147              << ", gain(temp.corrected if required) = " << gainconst_tempcorr
01148              << ", intercalib = " << _intercalibconst[layer-1][strip-1]
01149              << ", mipcalib = " << _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] 
01150              << ", effNpix = " << _effNpix << endl;
01151 #endif
01152         
01153         // saturation correction for the number of photon.
01154         Double_t ampld = - _effNpix * std::log( 1. - ampl / _effNpix );
01155 
01156         //convert to the ADCcounts.
01157         ampl = ampld*
01158                 ( _gaincalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] / 
01159                   _intercalibconst[layer-1][strip-1] );
01160                 
01161         // MIP calibration
01162 //110712.1558 coterra. temperature correction for MIPconst 
01163 // was temporally[?] implemented. temp_this_evt is gotte temp for this event.
01164 //_tempcorr_gain[2] is temp. that gain data was taken.
01165         float mipconst_tempcorr = _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1];
01166 #if b110909
01167   cout << "START_MIPTEMPCORRE" << endl;
01168 #endif
01169         if (_tempcorrmipOn ){
01170            mipconst_tempcorr = mipconst_tempcorr
01171                                + _mipSlope[layer-1][strip-1]
01172                                * ( temp_this_evt - _mipSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1] );
01173 #if b110909
01174   cout << "MIPcon at " << _mipSetTemp[layer-1][strip-1] << " = " << _mipcalibconst[layer-1][strip-1]
01175        << ", Temp this event = " << temp_this_evt << " slope of [" << layer << "]["
01176        << strip << "] = " << _mipSlope[layer-1][strip-1] << " Corrected constant = " << mipconst_tempcorr 
01177        << " _effNpix:" << _effNpix << endl;
01178 #endif
01179         }
01180         ampl = ampl / mipconst_tempcorr;
01181 
01182 #if enecheck
01183         cout << " ampl 2 = " << ampl << endl;
01184 #endif
01185         //}
01186

01212         }

01290         //To use this processor for MIP calbration, you should 
01291         // _forMIPCalibration = true; ( default setting is talse )
